alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 5:34AM PDT until March 15 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet from 7000 to 8000 feet, 4 to 6 feet from 8000 to 9000 feet and 6 to 8 feet above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada above 7000 feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
